name: This Is Just A Game
description:
This Is Just A Game is a normal, perfectly fine survival game. If you happen to see green virus spiders and game errors, don’t mind it! It’s all a process of gaming, nothing is wrong.

  • If you find any mysterious spiders, don’t ask anything, we cannot help with that.

Okay, being serious, this game involves the inevitable end due to viruses (spiders), and your task is to delay the eventual crash and protect the games code by using the resources around you! Use your trusty pickaxe to mine resources, and craft guns to hopelessly defend the game’s existence!

Your controls are easy to learn,

  • Tab to open crafting
  • Left Click to mine resources with pickaxe / shoot with guns
  • WASD to move up down left and right

This game is a collaboration between Convg and Brainboy.

  • @convg behind the coding
  • @brainboyart behind the art and sound.

This game was created for Ludum Dare 50!

Hope you enjoy!

NOTE: Mac and Linux versions are untested. Sorry if they don't work, but we don't have builds to test them with.
